item.description:
DrupalCampCT is a full-day, no-cost event, structured around the open-source content management system, Drupal (www.drupal.org), which includes knowledgeable speakers, informative workshops, impromptu birds-of-a-feather sessions, an entertaining and informative keynote speaker and invaluable opportunities to network with other Drupalists in and around the Nutmeg State! We expect attendees to be a good mix of experienced Drupalists and newcomers to Drupal; developers, themers, content managers and project leaders; and consultants, corporate professionals, academics and passionate hobbyists.

Visit the DrupalCampCT website at 2012.drupalcampct.org to register and for more information.

Additional information can also be obtained through email to rsvp@drupalcampct.org.

Note: DrupalCampCT is a free event, however, registration is required at 2012.drupalcampct.org. Past DrupalCampCT's have had 150+ attendees and have reached registration capacity so be sure to register earlier rather than later if you are interested in attending this event.
item.name: DrupalCampCT 2012
